title: Slug Street Scrappers (2012)
overview: Punchy McBritches is a woman on a mission: to earn the title of the "toughest in town". And to achieve her goal she must first challenge and defeat the current toughest in town... a fella by the name of Bruiser Bom-Bash. But, a mysterious woman from Bruiser's past seems to have other plans for the two.
